sentences.english: Some kids squirted a water pistol in her face.
sentences.chinese: 有几个小孩用水枪朝她脸上喷水。

sentences.english: It just needs a little squirt of oil.
sentences.chinese: 它只需喷点油。

detailed_translations.english: if you squirt liquid or if it squirts somewhere, it is forced out in a thin fast stream

detailed_translations.chinese: 喷射； 〈口， 贬〉无名小辈
detailed_translations.english: Squirt is also a noun

name: erupt
trans: v. 喷发；爆发，突然发生；（感情）迸发；（斑疹等）突然冒出；长牙

sentences.english: Violence erupted after police shot a student during the demonstration.
sentences.chinese: 警察向示威人群中的一名学生开枪，暴乱随之发生。

sentences.english: A political row erupted over the MP’s comments.
sentences.chinese: 这名下院议员的评论引发了一场政治论战。

sentences.english: The volcano erupted in 1980, devastating a large area of Washington state.
sentences.chinese: 这座火山1980年喷发，摧毁了华盛顿州的大片地区。

detailed_translations.english: if fighting, violence, noise etc erupts, it starts suddenly

name: outburst
trans: n. （火山、情感等的）爆发；破裂

sentences.english: ...a spontaneous outburst of cheers and applause.
sentences.chinese: …由衷爆发出的欢呼声和掌声。

detailed_translations.english: An outburst of an emotion, especially anger, is a sudden strong expression of that emotion

name: eruption
trans: n. 喷发；（战争、怒气等的）爆发；发疹

sentences.english: The last eruption of this volcano lasted over a year, so this cannot be ruled out.
sentences.chinese: 该火山上次爆发持续了一年，所以现在也不能排除这个可能性。

sentences.english: Our work was like that of geologists who compile the signs of an imminent earthquake or volcanic eruption.
sentences.chinese: 我们的工作如同地质学家，我们收集一场即将到来的地震或火山爆发的迹象。

sentences.english: If a volcanic eruption wipes out all of the plain mice, the island will be repopulated by striped mice.
sentences.chinese: 假设一次火山爆发消灭了所有的普通老鼠，那么这个小岛将是斑纹鼠的天下。

name: volcanic
trans: adj. 火山的，火山引发的；（感情或情绪）猛烈的，易突然发作的 n. 火山岩

sentences.english: black volcanic sand
sentences.chinese: 黑色的火山砂

detailed_translations.english: relating to or caused by a volcano

name: thermal
trans: adj. 热的，热量的；（衣服）保暖的，御寒的；（水）天然温热的；地热的，地温的（同 geothermal） n. 上升的热气流；保暖衣服，保暖内衣（thermals）； 上升的热气流

sentences.english: thermal energy
sentences.chinese: 热能

detailed_translations.english: relating to or caused by heat
a rising current of warm air used by birds

name: tundra
trans: n. [生态] 苔原；[地理] 冻原；冻土地带

sentences.english: Frozen dog dirt stipples the tundra of the golf course.
sentences.chinese: 冻成冰块的狗屎点缀着高尔夫球场的苔原。

sentences.english: The park contains 150 lakes and 450 miles of streams, plus ecosystems ranging from wetlands to pine forests to montane areas to alpine tundra.
sentences.chinese: 这个国家公园包括150个湖泊和450英里河流以及从湿地到松林、从山丘到高山冻原等各种生态系统。

detailed_translations.english: the large flat areas of land in the north of Russia, Canada etc, where it is very cold and there are no trees

name: toll
trans: n. （道路、桥梁等的）通行费；<美>长途电话费；（事故、灾难、战争等的）伤亡人数；严重的不良影响；（缓慢的）钟声 v. （缓慢地）敲（钟），鸣（钟）；鸣钟告知；收取（桥梁或道路的）通行费

sentences.english: Church bells tolled and black flags fluttered.
sentences.chinese: 教堂丧钟敲响了，黑旗飘动着。

detailed_translations.english: if a large bell tolls, or if you toll it, it keeps ringing slowly, especially to show that someone has died

detailed_translations.chinese: 过路费，过桥费；伤亡人数，损失
detailed_translations.english: the number of people killed or injured in a particular accident, by a particular illness etc

name: precious
trans: adj. 宝贵的，珍贵的；珍视的，重要的；珍稀的，珍奇的；<非正式>（表示气愤）宝贝似的；（言行）矫揉造作的，过分讲究的；<美，非正式>可爱的，讨人喜欢的 n. （用作称呼）宝贝，亲爱的 adv. 非常，极其

sentences.english: planes delivering precious supplies of medicine and food
sentences.chinese: 运送药品、食品等宝贵物资的飞机

sentences.english: our planet’s precious resources
sentences.chinese: 我们星球上的宝贵资源

detailed_translations.english: something that is precious is valuable and important and should not be wasted or used without care

name: prosperous
trans: adj. 繁荣的，富足的

sentences.english: a prosperous landowner
sentences.chinese: 富裕的土地拥有者

detailed_translations.english: rich and successful

name: prosperity
trans: n. 繁荣，成功

sentences.english: a time of economic prosperity
sentences.chinese: 经济繁荣时期

detailed_translations.english: when people have money and everything that is needed for a good life

name: rich
trans: adj. 有钱的，富有的；富含……的，丰富的；非常有趣的，丰富多彩的；（食物）油腻的；（色彩、气味）浓郁的，（声音）浑厚的；肥沃的，丰产的；华丽昂贵的；<非正式>（指某人的评论或批评）荒唐的，可笑的；值钱的，生财的；（内燃机内的混合燃料）可燃性成分高的

sentences.english: Rich mineral deposits have been found in the sea bed.
sentences.chinese: 海底发现有丰富的矿床。

sentences.english: Red meat is a rich source of iron.
sentences.chinese: 红肉含有大量铁质。

sentences.english: This is a system in which the rich are taken care of and the poor are left to suffer.
sentences.chinese: 这是个富人受关照，而穷人遭罪的制度。

detailed_translations.english: containing a lot of something

detailed_translations.chinese: (Rich)人名；(丹)里克；(捷)里赫；(英、西)里奇；(葡、法)里什
detailed_translations.english: The rich are rich people

name: rare
trans: adj. 少见的，不常发生的；稀罕的，珍贵的；半熟的，半生的；（品质）极好的，杰出的；（空气）稀薄的，缺氧的；<英，非正式>非常的，极度的

sentences.english: This species of plant is becoming increasingly rare.
sentences.chinese: 这种植物越来越罕见。

sentences.english: I only saw Helen on the rare occasions when I went into her shop.
sentences.chinese: 我只有偶尔去海伦店里时才会见到她。

sentences.english: It is very rare for her to miss a day at school.
sentences.chinese: 她很少有哪一天不上学的。

detailed_translations.english: not seen or found very often, or not happening very often

name: asset
trans: n. 有利条件，有价值的人或物；资产，财产

sentences.english: the value of a company’s assets
sentences.chinese: 公司的资产价值

detailed_translations.chinese: 资产， 财产； 有价值的特性或技能， 优点
detailed_translations.english: the things that a company owns, that can be sold to pay debts

name: fortune
trans: n. 时运，命运；好运，机遇；财富，巨款；未来，前途 v. 给予财富；偶然发生

sentences.english: I had the good fortune to work with a brilliant head of department.
sentences.chinese: 我有幸与一位出色的部门主管共事。

sentences.english: Sickness or ill fortune could reduce you to a needy situation.
sentences.chinese: 疾病或厄运会让你穷困潦倒。

sentences.english: I felt it was useless to struggle against fortune.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得跟命运抗争是徒劳的。

detailed_translations.english: chance or luck, and the effect that it has on your life

name: opulence
trans: n. 富裕；丰富

sentences.english: They have concentrated on a opulence life style and realize thepoor working man who has seen very little benefit from the sale of oil is notgoing to come to their rescue.
sentences.chinese: 他们现在过着富裕的生活，并意识到那些从石油销售中没有获得多少好处的贫穷工人是不会来拯救他们的。

sentences.english: We believe our clients are more sophisticated they believe in a lifestyle of improved working environment, we believe this means opulence is not sufficient and more tools will be required.
sentences.chinese: 我们认为客户更复杂，他们信仰改善工作环境的生活方式，我们认为这意味空间的富裕是不够的，需要更多的工具。

name: finance
trans: n. 财政，金融；资金，财源；财务事务，经济情况 v. 提供资金；贷款购买，赊购

sentences.english: leasing and other forms of business finance
sentences.chinese: 租赁及其他商业金融形式

sentences.english: Russia’s finance minister
sentences.chinese: 俄罗斯财政部长

sentences.english: the world of high finance
sentences.chinese: 高级金融界

detailed_translations.chinese: 财政，金融；财源，财务情况
detailed_translations.english: the management of money by governments, large organizations etc
to provide money, especially a lot of money, to pay for something

name: economic
trans: adj. 经济的，经济学的；有利可图的；节约的

sentences.english: Economic growth is slow.
sentences.chinese: 经济增长缓慢。

sentences.english: the government’s economic policy
sentences.chinese: 政府的经济政策

sentences.english: Economic reform is needed.
sentences.chinese: 经济改革势在必行。

sentences.english: In the current economic climate (= conditions ), we must keep costs down.
sentences.chinese: 在当前的经济形势下，我们一定要控制好成本。

detailed_translations.english: relating to trade, in-dustry, and the management of money

name: indigent
trans: adj. 贫困的；贫穷的（副词 indigently）

sentences.english: No where in the article does it mention her financial status. So…what is it that leads everyone to assume she was indigent?
sentences.chinese: 在文章中哪也没提及她的财务状况。那么…究竟是什么导致每个人都认为她是贫困的？

sentences.english: They "either fail to pay anything or pay a greatly-reduced amount designed for indigent or low income patients lacking insurance, " according to DHS.
sentences.chinese: 他们“一分钱都不付或者只支付非常少的费用，原先为贫困或短缺保险的低收入病人设定的费用。”

detailed_translations.english: very poor

name: depression
trans: n. 抑郁，沮丧；萧条（期），不景气；低气压；凹陷，浅坑；俯角，俯视角

sentences.english: Mr. Thomas was suffering from depression.
sentences.chinese: 托马斯先生当时正受抑郁症折磨。

detailed_translations.chinese: 抑郁， 沮丧； 不景气， 萧条； 洼地， 凹陷
detailed_translations.english: the period during the 1930s when there was not much business activity and not many jobs

name: penury
trans: n. 贫困；贫穷

sentences.english: He died in penury in 1644.
sentences.chinese: 1644年他穷困潦倒而死。

detailed_translations.english: the state of being very poor

name: bidding
trans: n. （尤指拍卖中的）出价；（拍卖时买方）报出的价钱；投标；吩咐，要求；叫牌 v. 出价；投标，竞标；努力争取（bid 的现在分词）

name: drawback
trans: n. 缺点，不利条件；出口退税

sentences.english: It’s a great city – the only drawback is the weather.
sentences.chinese: 这是座很不错的城市，唯一的不足就是天气。

detailed_translations.english: a disadvantage of a situation, plan, product etc

name: exponent
trans: n. 拥护者，倡导者；代表人物；指数，幂；大师，行家；成分；说明者，说明物 adj. 说明的

sentences.english: The fatigue life increases with decreasing modulus of surface layer in a power function with a negative exponent.
sentences.chinese: 沥青面层的疲劳寿命随着面层材料模量的降低以负指数的幂函数形式增加；

sentences.english: In addition, this paper also suggests that the reason for high burning rate-pressure exponent is deflagration of some components in propellant.
sentences.chinese: 此外，本文还提出，火药中某些组分的爆燃是导致一些火药燃速压力指数较高的原因。

sentences.english: Examining the influence of the sports factors on the step exponent of colleges students with the experiment method, questionnaire survey method and Mathematical Statistics method.
sentences.chinese: 采用实验法、问卷调查法和数理统计法，观察运动因素对大学生台阶指数的影响。

detailed_translations.english: a sign written above and to the right of a number or letter to show how many times that quantity is to be multiplied by itself

name: lease
trans: n. 租约，租契 v. 出租，租用

sentences.english: The landlord refused to renew his lease.
sentences.chinese: 房东拒绝和他续签租约。

sentences.english: The 99-year lease expired in 1999.
sentences.chinese: 99年期的租约于1999年到期。

sentences.english: Do you understand all the terms of the lease?
sentences.chinese: 租约条款你都理解吗？

detailed_translations.english: a legal agreement which allows you to use a building, car etc for a period of time, in return for rent

detailed_translations.chinese: 出租； 租得， 租有
detailed_translations.english: to use a building, car etc under a lease

name: redress
trans: v. 纠正；重新放直；重新调整，使恢复（平衡）；赔偿；救济 n. 赔偿；矫正；救济

sentences.english: Little could be done to redress the situation .
sentences.chinese: 局势难以挽回。

sentences.english: Affirmative action was meant to redress the balance (= make the situation fair ) for minorities.
sentences.chinese: 反歧视行动旨在弥补对少数群体的不公平待遇。

detailed_translations.chinese: 救济；赔偿；纠正；重新调整
detailed_translations.english: to correct something that is wrong or unfair
money that someone pays you because they have caused you harm or damaged your property

name: compensation
trans: n. 赔偿金，补偿金；弥补，抵消；报酬，薪水

sentences.english: People who are wrongly arrested may be paid compensation .
sentences.chinese: 被误抓的人有可能得到补偿费。

detailed_translations.english: money paid to someone because they have suffered injury or loss, or because something they own has been damaged

name: deficit
trans: n. 亏损，赤字，不足额；（体育用语）失分数；缺乏，缺陷

sentences.english: the country’s widening budget deficit
sentences.chinese: 这个国家日益严重的预算赤字

sentences.english: the US’s foreign trade deficit
sentences.chinese: 美国的对外贸易逆差

detailed_translations.english: the difference between the amount of something that you have and the higher amount that you need

name: levy
trans: v. 征收（罚款、税款等）；扣押财产（以执行判决）；<古>征兵；发动（战争） n. 征收额，税款；（为执行判决而进行的）财产扣押；征兵

sentences.english: ...an annual levy on all drivers.
sentences.chinese: …向所有司机征收的年税。

sentences.english: a new tax levied on all electrical goods
sentences.chinese: 对所有电器商品征收的一种新税

detailed_translations.english: an additional sum of money, usually paid as a tax
to officially say that people must pay a tax or charge

name: ration
trans: n. 配给量，定量；（尤指发给作战士兵的）口粮配给，口粮定量；合理（正常）的量；粮食供应，食物储备；应得之量 v. 对（供应品）定量供应，实行配给；对（某人）实行定量供给，配给

sentences.english: Fuel was rationed during the war.
sentences.chinese: 战争期间，燃油定量供应。

detailed_translations.english: to control the supply of something because there is not enough
a fixed amount of something that people are allowed to have when there is not enough, for example during a war

name: rebate
trans: v. 退还（部分付款）；扣除；在（木块）上开槽口；用槽口衔接（木块） n. 退还款；折扣；（木块的）槽口；返还部分 n. （Rebate）（印）雷瓦特（人名）

sentences.english: Deposit any random checks you get - like rebate, rewards or reimbursement checks - into this fund.
sentences.chinese: 把你挣的随机钱——比如像回扣，鉴赏，或偿款等——存到这个基金里。

sentences.english: I placed an order for desktop pc memory which came with a $20 MIR [mail in rebate].
sentences.chinese: 我订购了一个价值20美元的桌面个人电脑存储器，可以申请回扣的。

name: merchandise
trans: n. 商品，货品；相关商品，指定商品 v. （用广告等方式）推销（商品或服务）；推介，宣传（思想，人）；<古>从商

sentences.english: A range of official Disney merchandise was on sale.
sentences.chinese: 一系列正版的迪士尼商品在出售。

sentences.english: They inspected the merchandise carefully.
sentences.chinese: 他们仔细地检查了商品。

detailed_translations.english: goods that are being sold
to try to sell goods or services using methods such as advertising

name: commerce
trans: n. 贸易，商业；<旧>社交，交往；<旧>性交

sentences.english: measures promoting local commerce and industry
sentences.chinese: 促进地方工商业发展的措施

detailed_translations.english: the buying and selling of goods and services

name: enterprise
trans: n. 企业，事业单位；事业心，进取心；事业；创业，企业经营

sentences.english: state/public enterprise (=one owned by the government)
sentences.chinese: 国有企业/公共事业单位

sentences.english: We’re looking for young people with enterprise and creativity.
sentences.chinese: 我们在寻找有事业心和创造力的年轻人。

detailed_translations.chinese: 事业,企(事)业单位；事业心,进取心
detailed_translations.english: a company, organization, or business

name: currency
trans: n. 通货，货币；通用，流行；现时性

sentences.english: The bank can supply you with foreign currency .
sentences.chinese: 这家银行能为你提供外币。

sentences.english: There are moves towards a single currency in Europe.
sentences.chinese: 欧洲有向单一货币发展的趋势。

sentences.english: The local currency is the Swiss franc.
sentences.chinese: 当地的货币是瑞士法郎。

detailed_translations.english: the system or type of money that a country uses

name: inventory
trans: n. 详细目录，清单；存货，库存；盘货，存货盘点 v. 开列清单

sentences.english: ...one inventory of twelve sails for each yacht.
sentences.chinese: …为每艘游艇配备12张帆的存货。

detailed_translations.chinese: 详细目录， 存货清单
detailed_translations.english: a list of all the things in a place

name: quota
trans: n. 定额，限额；（人对事情、品质或属性拥有的）份额；定量，指标；（候选人当选所需的）规定票数，最低票数；（英国国教会牧区贡献给主教教区的）资金份额；<非正式>预计量

sentences.english: The government has decided to scrap quotas on car imports.
sentences.chinese: 政府决定取消汽车进口配额。

sentences.english: There are plans to introduce strict immigration quotas.
sentences.chinese: 有计划要推行严格的移民限额制度。

detailed_translations.english: an official limit on the number or amount of something that is allowed in a particular period

name: tariff
trans: n. （政府对进出口货物征收的）关税，关税表；（旅馆、饭店或服务公司的）价目表，收费表；<英，法律>量刑标准 v. 按税率定……的价格；征收关税

sentences.english: America wants to eliminate tariffs on items such as electronics.
sentences.chinese: 美国想要取消电子类产品的关税。

detailed_translations.english: a tax on goods coming into a country or going out of a country

name: inflation
trans: n. 通货膨胀，通胀率；充气，膨胀，增大；（宇宙论某些理论）暴涨；夸张，自命不凡

sentences.english: Inflation is now at over 16%.
sentences.chinese: 通货膨胀率现已超过16%。

detailed_translations.english: a continuing increase in prices, or the rate at which prices increase

name: deal
trans: n. 大量；交易；坏运气，不公平的对待；发牌；冷衫木；优惠的价格，划算的价格；牌戏的一局；一手牌 v. 应对（难缠的人，困难局面）（deal with）；（以某种方式）对付，对待（deal with）；论及，讨论（deal with）；买卖，交易；给予；贩卖（毒品、艺术品等）；与……有关；发牌

sentences.english: The prime minister promised farmers a new deal (= a new and fairer system ) .
sentences.chinese: 首相向农民保证推行一项新政策。

detailed_translations.english: treatment of a particular type that is given or received

name: yen
trans: n. 日元（日本货币单位）；渴望 vi. 渴望 n. （Yen）人名；（土、柬）延

sentences.english: The dollar fell by 24 percent against the yen (= decreased in value in relation to the yen ) between 1970 and 1973.
sentences.chinese: 在1970年至1973年间，美元对日元的汇率下跌了24%。

detailed_translations.chinese: 日元（日本货币单位）；渴望
detailed_translations.english: the standard unit of money in Japan: symbol ¥

sentences.english: It’s our job to establish the cause of the fire.
sentences.chinese: 查明起火原因是我们的责任。

sentences.english: There is no cause for alarm.
sentences.chinese: 不必惊慌。

sentences.english: My father fought for the Nationalist cause.
sentences.chinese: 我父亲为民族党的事业而奋斗。

detailed_translations.english: a person, event, or thing that makes something happen

name: consume
trans: v. 消耗，消费；吃，喝；吞噬，烧毁；使……着迷，充满

sentences.english: Some of the most efficient refrigerators consume 70 percent less electricity than traditional models.
sentences.chinese: 一些能效最高的冰箱比传统型号少消耗70%的电。

detailed_translations.english: To consume an amount of fuel, energy, or time means to use it up
to use time, energy, goods etc

name: disburse
trans: vt. 支付；支出

sentences.english: The aid will not be disbursed until next year.
sentences.chinese: 援助款项到明年才能拨出。

detailed_translations.english: to pay out money, especially from a large sum that is available for a special purpose

name: acting
trans: adj. 代理的；表演的 n. 表演，演技 v. 行动；举动，表现；假装（act 的现在分词形式）

sentences.english: The new acting president has a reputation of being someone who is independent.
sentences.chinese: 这位新的临时代理总裁有极有主见的名声。

detailed_translations.english: You use acting before the title of a job to indicate that someone is doing that job temporarily
the job or skill of performing in plays and films

name: inertia
trans: n. 缺乏活力，惰性；无变化；惯性

sentences.english: Inertia carried the plane onto the ground.
sentences.chinese: 飞机靠惯性着陆。

sentences.english: I can't seem to throw off this feeling of inertia.
sentences.chinese: 我好像无法摆脱这种无力的感觉。

detailed_translations.english: the force that keeps an object in the same position or keeps it moving until it is moved or stopped by another force

name: discount
trans: n. 减价，折扣；（汇票或期票到期前转手的）贴现率 adj. 打折的，减价出售的 v. 打折，减价；不重视，忽视；贴现；（持票人或受票人）把（票据）贴现

sentences.english: They are often available at a discount.
sentences.chinese: 它们经常可以以折扣价买到。

sentences.english: This has forced airlines to discount fares heavily in order to spur demand.
sentences.chinese: 这已经迫使多家航空公司对机票大幅打折以刺激需求。

detailed_translations.english: a reduction in the usual price of something

detailed_translations.chinese: 将…打折扣； 不信； 漠视， 低估
detailed_translations.english: If a shop or company discounts an amount or percentage from something that they are selling, they take the amount or percentage off the usual price

name: audit
trans: n. 审计，查……的账目；审查，审核；审计报告 v. 审计，查账；<美>旁听

sentences.english: Each year they audit our accounts and certify them as being true and fair.
sentences.chinese: 每年他们都会审核我们的账目，以证明其准确合理。

detailed_translations.english: to officially examine a company’s financial records in order to check that they are correct
an official examination of a company’s financial records in order to check that they are correct

name: shipment
trans: n. 运输，运送；运输的货物，装载的货物量

sentences.english: The goods are ready for shipment.
sentences.chinese: 货物已经准备好装运。

detailed_translations.english: a load of goods sent by sea, road, or air, or the act of sending them

name: surplus
trans: n. 过剩，剩余，过剩量；盈余，顺差；超净资产 adj. 过剩的，剩余的，多余的；（商店）出售剩余（或过时的）军用品的 v. 甩卖，变卖

sentences.english: Ethiopia has no surplus food.
sentences.chinese: 埃塞俄比亚没有多余的食物。

detailed_translations.english: more than what is needed or used
an amount of something that is more than what is needed or used

name: residue
trans: n. 剩余物，残留物；（扣除应付款项、债款、遗赠后的）剩余遗产，余产

sentences.english: The flies leave a sticky residue on crops.
sentences.chinese: 苍蝇在庄稼上留下黏糊糊的分泌物。

sentences.english: Rinse off any soap residue.
sentences.chinese: 冲净残留的肥皂。

detailed_translations.english: a substance that remains on a surface, in a container etc and cannot be removed easily, or that remains after a chemical process

name: account
trans: n. 账户，户头；客户，老主顾；网络账号；描述，报道；账目；账单；赊购账，赊购；理由，解释；重要性；（定期结付的）交易合同；演奏（音乐）；<英>账期交易期 v. 把……视作，认为；解释，说明（account for）；占（一定数量或比例）（account for）；<古>报账

sentences.english: My salary is paid into my bank account.
sentences.chinese: 我的工资直接存入我的银行账户。

sentences.english: I’ve opened an account with Barclay’s Bank.
sentences.chinese: 我在巴克莱银行开了一个账户。

sentences.english: My husband and I have a joint account (=  one that is shared between two people  ) .
sentences.chinese: 我和丈夫有个联名账户。

detailed_translations.english: an arrangement in which a bank keeps your money safe so that you can pay more in or take money out

name: bankruptcy
trans: n. 道德的沦丧；破产，倒闭

sentences.english: In 1999 it was revealed that he was close to bankruptcy.
sentences.chinese: 1999年他被披露几近破产。

sentences.english: When inflation rises, so do bankruptcies.
sentences.chinese: 通货膨胀加剧，破产个案也会增加。

detailed_translations.english: the state of being unable to pay your debts

name: savings
trans: n. 储蓄；存款；救助；节省物（saving 的复数形式）

sentences.english: You can enjoy a year's membership for just $28 – a saving of $7 off the regular rate.
sentences.chinese: 你只需花$28就可以享受一年的会员资格–比正常会费节省了$7。

detailed_translations.chinese: 储蓄；存款；救助；节省物（saving的复数形式）
detailed_translations.english: A saving is a reduction in the amount of time or money that is used or needed

name: collateral
trans: n. 抵押物，担保品；旁系亲属 adj. 附属的，次要的；（亲戚）旁系的，非直系的；并列的，并行的

sentences.english: There may be collateral benefits to the scheme.
sentences.chinese: 这项计划可能有附带的益处。

detailed_translations.english: relating to something or happening as a result of it, but not as important

detailed_translations.chinese: 抵押品；[法] 担保品；旁系亲属
detailed_translations.english: property or other goods that you promise to give someone if you cannot pay back the money they lend you

name: bill
trans: n. （商品、服务或餐馆的）账单；议案，法案；纸币，钞票；演出人员名单；广告，传单；票据，汇票；单子，清单；喙 v. 开账单；把……宣传为；宣布（某人）将参加演出

sentences.english: Have you paid the phone bill?
sentences.chinese: 电话费你付了吗？

detailed_translations.english: a written list showing how much you have to pay for services you have received, work that has been done etc

name: check
trans: v. 检查，核对；查看，查询；克制，抑制；存放，寄放；托运；在……上打钩；将（对方的）军 n. 检查，核对；制止（手段），抑制（手段）；结账单；支票（=cheque）；方格图案；衣帽寄存处；寄存凭证；钩号；（国际象棋）将军

sentences.english: Check the tiles carefully before you buy them.
sentences.chinese: 购买之前要把瓷砖仔细检查一下。

sentences.english: A first rule in solving any mystery is to check the facts.
sentences.chinese: 揭开谜团的第一条规则是核查事实。

sentences.english: The police are failing to take adequate measures to check the growth in crime.
sentences.chinese: 警方未能采取适当的措施来阻止犯罪率上升。

sentences.english: Conduct regular checks on your water quality.
sentences.chinese: 要经常检查水质。

detailed_translations.english: to do something in order to find out whether something really is correct, true, or in good condition
the process of finding out if something is safe, correct, true, or in the condition it should be

name: coin
trans: n. 硬币，金属货币；塔罗牌中的一种花色（coins） v. 创造新词，首次使用；铸币，造币；<英，非正式>迅速而轻松地发财

sentences.english: Toss a coin to see who goes first.
sentences.chinese: 抛硬币决定谁先来。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of metal, usually flat and round, that is used as money
to make pieces of money from metal

name: depreciate
trans: v. （使）贬值，（使）降价；贬低，轻视

sentences.english: New cars depreciate in value quickly.
sentences.chinese: 新车掉价很快。

detailed_translations.english: to decrease in value or price

name: merge
trans: v. （使）合并，（使）融合；渐渐消失于，融入；兼并（产权，产业）

sentences.english: The company plans to merge its subsidiaries in the US.
sentences.chinese: 该公司计划合并其在美国的几家子公司。

detailed_translations.english: to combine, or to join things together to form one thing

name: reimburse
trans: v. <正式>偿还，付还（钱款）

sentences.english: I'll be happy to reimburse you for any expenses you've had.
sentences.chinese: 我很乐意报销你的所有花费。

detailed_translations.english: to pay money back to someone when their money has been spent or lost

name: garner
trans: vt. 获得；储存；把……储入谷仓 n. 谷仓

sentences.english: Durham had garnered three times as many votes as Carey.
sentences.chinese: 德拉姆获得的选票数是凯里的3倍。

sentences.english: He has garnered extensive support for his proposals.
sentences.chinese: 他为他的提议赢得了广泛的支持。

detailed_translations.english: If someone has garnered something useful or valuable, they have gained it or collected it

name: underestimate
trans: v. 低估，对……估计不足；轻视，小看（某人） n. 低估，对……估计不足

sentences.english: We underestimated how long it would take to get there.
sentences.chinese: 我们低估了到那里所需的时间。

sentences.english: Never underestimate the power of the press.
sentences.chinese: 绝不要低估新闻界的力量。

detailed_translations.english: to think or guess that something is smaller, cheaper, easier etc than it really is

name: exchange
trans: n. 交换，互换；短暂的交谈，争吵；交战，交火；兑换，汇兑；交流，互访；交易所；（商品的）调换；电话局，电话交换台；换子，兑子 v. 调换，更换；交流，交谈；交换，互换；兑换，交易

sentences.english: We exchange gifts at Christmas.
sentences.chinese: 我们在圣诞节时交换礼物。

sentences.english: It’s a place where people can chat and exchange ideas.
sentences.chinese: 在这个地方人们可以聊天和交流想法。

sentences.english: Four of my cassettes for your Madonna CD is a fair exchange.
sentences.chinese: 我用四盒磁带换你的麦当娜激光唱片很公平。

detailed_translations.english: to give someone something and receive the same kind of thing from them at the same time
the act of giving someone something and receiving something else from them

name: assess
trans: v. 评价，评定；估价，估计；征税，处以罚金

sentences.english: The test was to assess aptitude rather than academic achievement.
sentences.chinese: 该测试将评估能力而不是学业成绩。

detailed_translations.chinese: 对估价； 评价， 评论
detailed_translations.english: to make a judgment about a person or situation after thinking carefully about it

name: consolidate
trans: v. 使巩固，使加强；合并，统一

sentences.english: The company has consolidated its position as the country’s leading gas supplier.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司巩固了作为该国主要煤气供应商的地位。

sentences.english: We consolidate information from a wide range of sources.
sentences.chinese: 我们把来自各种渠道的信息加以汇总。

detailed_translations.english: to strengthen the position of power or success that you have, so that it becomes more effective or continues for longer

name: loan
trans: n. 贷款，借款；借用，借出；<苏格兰>（尤指通向开阔地的）小径；（未开垦的开阔的）挤奶牧场 v. 借出，借给

sentences.english: We obtained a loan from the government.
sentences.chinese: 我们得了一笔政府贷款。

sentences.english: If you ask him for a loan, he'll come through.
sentences.chinese: 如果你向他贷款，他会满足你的要求的。

sentences.english: The company won't keep going unless we can get some loan.
sentences.chinese: 除非我们能搞到贷款，否则公司就维持不下去了。

detailed_translations.english: an amount of money that you borrow from a bank etc

name: refund
trans: n. 退款，偿还金额 v. 退还（钱款）；退款给，还钱给（某人）

sentences.english: They refused to give me a refund .
sentences.chinese: 他们拒绝给我退款。

sentences.english: Return your purchase within 14 days for a full refund .
sentences.chinese: 14 天之内退货可以全额退款。

sentences.english: You should go down there and demand a refund.
sentences.chinese: 你应该到那里去，要求退款。

detailed_translations.english: an amount of money that is given back to you if you are not satisfied with the goods or services that you have paid for
to give someone their money back, especially because they are not satisfied with the goods or services they have paid for

name: utility
trans: n. （煤气、水、电等的）公共服务，公用事业；（供电、供水等的）公用事业单位；应用程序，实用程序；实用，有用；<澳>小卡车，轻型货车；（博弈论，经济学）效用 adj. 有用的，多功能的；（体育运动）多面手的；实用的

sentences.english: Does your rent include utilities?
sentences.chinese: 你的房租包括公用事业费吗？

detailed_translations.chinese: 公用事业〔如煤气、电力等〕
detailed_translations.english: a service such as gas or electricity provided for people to use

name: selection
trans: n. 选择，挑选；被挑选的人（或物），精选品；可供选择的事物；（比赛中值得赌的）看好的马；所选数据；（英国的）学校入学选拔；<澳/新，史>（以优越条件）选购土地

sentences.english: The judges have made their final selection.
sentences.chinese: 评委已经作出最后的评选。

sentences.english: These drawings represent a selection from a larger exhibition.
sentences.chinese: 这些画作是从一个规模更大的展会上选出来的。

detailed_translations.english: the careful choice of a particular person or thing from a group of similar people or things

name: option
trans: n. 可选择的事物；选择，选择权；（将来的）买卖选择权利，期权；（计算机程序中的）选项；<英>选修课；（购买新设备，尤其是汽车时提供的）附件，配件 v. 买卖（某物的）期权

sentences.english: There are a number of options available.
sentences.chinese: 有多种选择。

sentences.english: He had two options.
sentences.chinese: 他有两种选择。

sentences.english: This was not the only option open to him.
sentences.chinese: 这并非是他的唯一选择。

sentences.english: Teenage mothers often have no option but to (= have no other choice except to ) live with their parents.
sentences.chinese: 少女妈妈往往别无选择，只能与父母同住。

detailed_translations.chinese: 选择， 选择权， 选择自由； 选择的事物， 选课
detailed_translations.english: a choice you can make in a particular situation

name: economics
trans: n. 经济学；经济情况；经济体制

sentences.english: a Harvard professor of economics
sentences.chinese: 哈佛大学的经济学教授

detailed_translations.english: the study of the way in which money and goods are produced and used

name: output
trans: n. 产量，作品；产生，生产过程；输出功率；（计算机的）输出信息；输出端 v. 输出

sentences.english: Output is up 30% on last year.
sentences.chinese: 产量比去年提高了30%。

detailed_translations.english: the amount of goods or work produced by a person, machine, factory etc
if a computer outputs information, it produces it

name: goods
trans: n. 商品；动产，私人财产；<英>（公路、铁路等运输的）货物；<美，非正式>本领；<美，非正式>正要寻找的人（或物）

sentences.english: a goods train
sentences.chinese: 一列货车

sentences.english: the large market for consumer goods
sentences.chinese: 庞大的消费品市场

sentences.english: Britain’s leading exporter of manufactured goods
sentences.chinese: 英国主要的工业制成品出口商

sentences.english: There will be tax increases on a range of goods and services .
sentences.chinese: 有一些商品和服务将要增税。

detailed_translations.english: things which are carried by road, train etc

name: opportunity
trans: n. 时机，机会

sentences.english: There are fewer opportunities for new graduates this year.
sentences.chinese: 今年新毕业的大学生就业机会较少。

detailed_translations.english: a chance to do something or an occasion when it is easy for you to do something

name: benefit
trans: n. 好处，益处；救济金，补助金；额外奖励，保险金；慈善活动 v. 对（某人）有用，使受益；得益于，得利于

sentences.english: They are working together to benefit the whole community.
sentences.chinese: 他们在为整个社区的利益共同努力。

detailed_translations.english: if you benefit from something, or it benefits you, it gives you an advantage, improves your life, or helps you in some way

detailed_translations.chinese: 利益，恩惠；救济金，保险金，津贴
detailed_translations.english: money provided by the government to people who are sick, unemployed, or have little money

name: contract
trans: n. 合同，契约；<非正式>暗杀协议；（桥牌）定约墩数；婚约，订婚 v. （使）收缩，缩小；签合同，订立契约；患上，感染；订立婚约（或盟约）；欠负（债）

sentences.english: Employees who refuse to relocate are in breach of contract (= have done something not allowed by their contracts ) .
sentences.chinese: 员工拒绝调动岗位是违反合约的。

detailed_translations.english: an official agreement between two or more people, stating what each will do

name: lottery
trans: n. 抽彩给奖法，博彩；<美>抽签法，随机选择；碰运气的事

sentences.english: a lottery ticket
sentences.chinese: 彩票

sentences.english: Do you really think winning the lottery would make you happy?
sentences.chinese: 你真的认为彩票中奖会带给你幸福吗？

detailed_translations.chinese: 彩票；碰运气的事，难算计的事；抽彩给奖法
detailed_translations.english: a game used to make money for a state or a  charity  in which people buy tickets with a series of numbers on them. If their number is picked by chance, they win money or a prize.

name: transaction
trans: n. 交易，买卖，业务；（学术团体会议的）议事录，公报；（人与人之间的）交流，相互影响；事务（元），事项

sentences.english: The bank charges a fixed rate for each transaction.
sentences.chinese: 银行对每一笔业务收取固定费用。

sentences.english: the transaction of government business
sentences.chinese: 处理政府事务

detailed_translations.english: a business deal or action, such as buying or selling something

name: budget
trans: n. 预算；政府预算案 v. 制定预算，制定开支计划；计划，安排 adj. 廉价的，经济型的

sentences.english: We’ll have to budget more carefully.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须更仔细地安排开支。

sentences.english: This scheme enables you to budget the cost through fixed monthly payments.
sentences.chinese: 这个计划可以让你把费用分摊在每个月里等额偿还。

sentences.english: Cheap flights are available from budget travel agents from $240.
sentences.chinese: 起价$240的廉价机票可从一些经济旅行社那里买到。

detailed_translations.english: to carefully plan and control how much money you spend and what you will buy with it

detailed_translations.chinese: 低廉的， 收费公道的
detailed_translations.english: Budget is used in advertising to suggest that something is being sold cheaply
the money that is available to an organization or person, or a plan of how it will be spent

name: patronage
trans: n. 赞助，资助；（对餐馆、酒店或其他生意的）惠顾，光顾；职位授予权，恩惠给予权；庇护，扶植；恩赐态度；（古罗马）庇护人的权力和职责，庇护人的地位

sentences.english: Thank you for your patronage.
sentences.chinese: 感谢您的惠顾。

detailed_translations.english: the support, especially financial support, that is given to an organization or activity by a patron

name: choose
trans: v. 选择，挑选；情愿，决定

sentences.english: It took us ages to choose a new carpet.
sentences.chinese: 我们挑选新地毯花了很长时间。

sentences.english: A panel of judges will choose the winner.
sentences.chinese: 会由一个评判小组选出冠军。

sentences.english: He chose his words carefully as he spoke.
sentences.chinese: 他说话时字斟句酌。

sentences.english: You can, if you choose, invest in the stock market.
sentences.chinese: 如果你愿意，可以投资股票市场。

detailed_translations.english: to decide which one of a number of things or people you want

name: choice
trans: n. 选择，抉择；选择的机会，选择权；选择范围，选择余地；入选者，被选中的东西；精选品 adj. 上等的，优质的；尖刻的，刻薄的；精选的

sentences.english: I think London was a good choice as a venue.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得伦敦是个很好的选址。

sentences.english: choice steak
sentences.chinese: 上等牛排

detailed_translations.english: the person or thing that someone chooses
(especially of food) of very good quality

name: barter
trans: v. 以物易物，物物交换；讨价还价 n. 物物交易制度，易货贸易；用于易物的物品

sentences.english: They have been bartering wheat for cotton and timber.
sentences.chinese: 他们一直在用小麦交换棉花和木材。

detailed_translations.chinese: 进行易货贸易；[贸易] 作物物交换；讨价还价
detailed_translations.english: to exchange goods, work, or services for other goods or services rather than for money

detailed_translations.chinese: 易货贸易；物物交换；实物交易
detailed_translations.english: a system of exchanging goods and services for other goods and services rather than using money

name: purchase
trans: n. <正式>购买，采购；<正式>购买的东西；<法律>（非继承性的）财产置得；<正式>紧握，牢牢抓住；（移动重物的）滑轮（或类似装置） v. <正式> 购买，采购；<古>（努力或艰难地）获得，得到；（航海）（用滑轮或杠杆）升起，举起（绳，索，锚）

sentences.english: She paid for her purchases and left.
sentences.chinese: 她付钱买好东西离开了。

sentences.english: I enclose my receipt as proof of purchase .
sentences.chinese: 我附上小票作为购物凭证。

sentences.english: She made two purchases from my stall.
sentences.chinese: 她从我的货摊上买了两样东西。

sentences.english: You can purchase insurance online.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在网上买保险。

detailed_translations.english: something you buy, or the act of buying it
to buy something

name: deposit
trans: v. 放下，放置；储蓄；存放，寄存；沉积，沉淀；支付（押金、订金或预缴费用） n. 沉积物，沉积层；订金；押金；存款；竞选保证金

sentences.english: You are advised to deposit your valuables in the hotel safe.
sentences.chinese: 建议您把贵重物品存到酒店保险箱里。

sentences.english: As the river slows down, it deposits a layer of soil.
sentences.chinese: 河水流速变慢时，一层泥土便沉积下来。

sentences.english: I’d like to make a deposit (= pay some money ) into my savings account.
sentences.chinese: 我想存一笔钱到我的储蓄账户里。

sentences.english: fatty deposits on the heart
sentences.chinese: 心脏上沉积的脂肪层

detailed_translations.english: to put money or something valuable in a bank or other place where it will be safe
an amount of money that is paid into a bank account

name: commission
trans: n. 考察团，委员会；佣金，回扣；犯罪；委托，命令；（军队中的）官职，军衔；（尤指艺术品）委托制作；<古>所授之权，代办权 v. 委托撰写，委托制作；委任，任命……为军官；（使军舰）正式使用，服现役

sentences.english: The Government set up a commission to investigate allegations of police violence.
sentences.chinese: 政府成立了一个委员会调查对警察施暴行为的指控。

detailed_translations.chinese: 委任状；委员会；佣金，回扣；授权，委托
detailed_translations.english: a group of people who have been given the official job of finding out about something or controlling something
to formally ask someone to write an official report, produce a work of art for you etc

name: ransom
trans: n. 赎金；释放 v. 赎出，赎回；把持（俘虏，监禁者）索要赎金，掳（人）索赎；得赎金后释放（俘虏，监禁者）

sentences.english: The same system was used for ransoming or exchanging captives.
sentences.chinese: 同一系统也被用来赎回或交换俘虏。

detailed_translations.chinese: 赎回，赎；勒索赎金；救赎；得赎金后释放
detailed_translations.english: If you ransom someone who has been kidnapped, you pay the money to set them free
an amount of money that is paid to free someone who is held as a prisoner

name: toll
trans: n. （道路、桥梁等的）通行费；<美>长途电话费；（事故、灾难、战争等的）伤亡人数；严重的不良影响；（缓慢的）钟声 v. （缓慢地）敲（钟），鸣（钟）；鸣钟告知；收取（桥梁或道路的）通行费

sentences.english: Church bells tolled and black flags fluttered.
sentences.chinese: 教堂丧钟敲响了，黑旗飘动着。

detailed_translations.english: if a large bell tolls, or if you toll it, it keeps ringing slowly, especially to show that someone has died

detailed_translations.chinese: 过路费，过桥费；伤亡人数，损失
detailed_translations.english: the number of people killed or injured in a particular accident, by a particular illness etc

name: charge
trans: v. 充电；使……承担责任，赋予……责任；控告，指控；（公开）指责，责备；进攻，冲锋；把……记在账上；要价，收费（金额）；<旧>给（枪炮）装弹；斟满（杯子） n. 电量，电荷；炸药量；掌管，照管；费用，价钱；控告，指控；（书面或口头的）指责，批评；需要照管的人；命令，指示；（人或动物的）猛攻，冲锋；<美，非正式>快感，刺激；感召力，感染力；负载

sentences.english: Leave the battery on charge all night.
sentences.chinese: 让电池充一晚上的电

sentences.english: Please charge your glasses and drink a toast to the bride and groom!
sentences.chinese: 请各位斟满酒杯向新娘、新郎敬酒！

detailed_translations.english: electricity that is put into a piece of electrical equipment such as a battery
to fill a glass

name: bond
trans: n. 纽带，联系；公债，债券；结合，黏合；承诺，契约；枷锁，桎梏 v. （使）建立亲密关系；与……黏合（或连接）

sentences.english: My father put all his money into stock market bonds.
sentences.chinese: 我父亲把他所有的钱都投在上市债券上。

sentences.english: furious trading on the bond market
sentences.chinese: 债券市场疯狂的交易

sentences.english: the emotional bond between mother and child
sentences.chinese: 母亲和孩子之间的感情纽带

detailed_translations.english: an official document promising that a government or company will pay back money that it has borrowed, often with interest

name: custom
trans: n. 风俗，习俗；习惯；光顾，惠顾；<法律>惯例，习惯法；（经常性的）顾客 adj. 定做的，量身设计的

sentences.english: She was stopped at customs and questioned.
sentences.chinese: 她在海关被叫住接受问话。

sentences.english: It took ages to clear customs (= be allowed through customs ) but then we were out of the airport quite quickly.
sentences.chinese: 过海关花了很长时间，不过出机场倒是很快。

sentences.english: You won’t be able to take that through customs.
sentences.chinese: 你带着那东西过不了海关的。

detailed_translations.english: the place where your bags are checked for illegal goods when you go into a country

name: bonus
trans: n. 奖金，津贴，红利；意外收获，额外好处

sentences.english: Long-term savers qualify for a cash bonus.
sentences.chinese: 长期储户可获现金红利。

sentences.english: Further additions to your pay may take the form of bonus payments.
sentences.chinese: 工资以外的钱可能以奖金的形式发放。

sentences.english: a Christmas bonus
sentences.chinese: 圣诞节奖金

sentences.english: Each worker receives an annual bonus.
sentences.chinese: 每个员工都可获得一笔年度奖金。

sentences.english: a £20,000 bonus
sentences.chinese: 一笔2万英镑的奖金

detailed_translations.english: money added to someone’s wages, especially as a reward for good work

name: interest
trans: n. 兴趣，关注；吸引力，趣味；爱好；利息；利益，好处；权益，股权；利害关系，重要影响；利益集团，利益相关者 v. 使感兴趣，引起……的关注；劝说（某人）做（或参与）

sentences.english: I watched the first few episodes, but soon lost interest.
sentences.chinese: 我看了前几集，但很快就失去了兴趣。

sentences.english: The last round of bidding aroused considerable interest.
sentences.chinese: 最后一轮竞价引起人们相当大的兴趣。

sentences.english: Our survey reveals a disturbing lack of interest in teacher training.
sentences.chinese: 我们的调查显示人们对教师培训失去了兴趣，这很令人不安。

sentences.english: I read your article with great interest.
sentences.chinese: 我兴致勃勃地拜读了您的文章。

sentences.english: to promote/protect/safeguard sb's interests
sentences.chinese: 为某人的利益游说；保护 / 维护某人的利益

sentences.english: The money was repaid with interest.
sentences.chinese: 这笔钱是带息偿还的。

detailed_translations.english: the feeling that you have when you want to know or learn more about sb/sth

name: means
trans: n. 方法，手段；财富，金钱 v. 表示……的意思，作……的解释；意味着；打算，意欲（mean 的第三人称单数形式）

sentences.english: The only means of communication was sign language.
sentences.chinese: 唯一的交流方法是手语。

sentences.english: The window was our only means of escape .
sentences.chinese: 跳窗是我们唯一的逃生方法。

sentences.english: Do you have any means of identification ?
sentences.chinese: 你有什么身份证明文件吗？

sentences.english: art as a means of expression
sentences.chinese: 作为一种表达方式的艺术

sentences.english: Homework should not be used as a means of controlling children.
sentences.chinese: 家庭作业不应该作为约束儿童的手段。

sentences.english: I had no means of telling him I would be late.
sentences.chinese: 我没有办法告诉他我会迟到。

sentences.english: Brian was prepared to use any means to get what he wanted.
sentences.chinese: 布赖恩准备不择手段地得到他想要的。

sentences.english: They had entered the country by unlawful means .
sentences.chinese: 他们通过非法途径进入了这个国家。

sentences.english: the means by which performance is assessed
sentences.chinese: 评估表现的手段

detailed_translations.english: a way of doing or achieving something

name: debt
trans: n. 欠款，债务；负债情况；人情债

sentences.english: He had enough money to pay off his outstanding debts.
sentences.chinese: 他有足够的钱偿还亏欠的债务。

sentences.english: students who run up huge debts
sentences.chinese: 欠下巨额债务的学生

detailed_translations.english: a sum of money that a person or organization owes

name: fund
trans: n. 基金，专款；资金，钱款；基金会；储备量 v. 资助，为……提供资金

sentences.english: The fund was set up to try to save the cathedral.
sentences.chinese: 设立基金以挽救大教堂。

detailed_translations.english: an amount of money that is collected and kept for a particular purpose
to provide money for an activity, organization, event etc

name: revenue
trans: n. （企业、组织的）收入，收益；（政府的）税收；税务局，税务署（the revenue）

sentences.english: advertising revenue
sentences.chinese: 广告收入

sentences.english: Strikes have cost £20 million in lost revenues .
sentences.chinese: 罢工造成的收入损失达到2,000万英镑。

detailed_translations.english: money that a business or organization receives over a period of time, especially from selling goods or services

name: noxious
trans: adj. 有害的；有毒的；败坏道德的；讨厌的

sentences.english: noxious fumes
sentences.chinese: 有毒烟雾

detailed_translations.chinese: 有害的；有毒的；败坏道德的；讨厌的
detailed_translations.english: harmful or poisonous

name: pollute
trans: v. 污染，弄脏；玷污，败坏

sentences.english: beaches polluted by raw sewage
sentences.chinese: 受未经处理的污水污染的海滩

sentences.english: The factory pollutes the air and water.
sentences.chinese: 那家工厂污染了空气和水。

detailed_translations.english: to make air, water, soil etc dangerously dirty and not suitable for people to use

name: pollutant
trans: n. 污染物

sentences.english: a dumping ground for toxic pollutants
sentences.chinese: 有毒污染物堆放场

detailed_translations.english: a substance that makes air, water, soil etc dangerously dirty, and is caused by cars, factories etc

name: pollution
trans: n. 污染；污染物；噪音污染，（夜间扰人的）强烈灯光

sentences.english: California’s tough anti-pollution laws
sentences.chinese: 加利福尼亚州严厉的反污染法

detailed_translations.english: the process of making air, water, soil etc dangerously dirty and not suitable for people to use, or the state of being dangerously dirty

name: contaminate
trans: v. 污染，弄脏；毒害，腐蚀（人的思想或品德）

sentences.english: Drinking water supplies are believed to have been contaminated.
sentences.chinese: 据信饮用水已受到污染。

detailed_translations.english: to make a place or substance dirty or harmful by putting something such as chemicals or poison in it

name: waste
trans: n. 浪费，滥用；废物，废弃物（同 wastes）；荒地，荒原（wastes）；<法律>（尤指因租借人的行为或疏忽而导致的）不动产的损坏，产业损伤；粪便，尿液 v. 浪费，滥用；未能充分利用，没有物尽其用；<美，非正式>杀害，谋杀（某人）；（使）（人，身体部位）逐渐变虚弱，变消瘦；<文>破坏，毁坏（地方）；<文>（时间）流逝，被花掉 adj. （通常指城市中的某地）荒芜的，荒废的；（材料、物质等）废弃的，无用的

sentences.english: excessive waste in state spending
sentences.chinese: 政府支出方面的过度浪费

detailed_translations.chinese: 浪费；废物；荒地；损耗；地面风化物
detailed_translations.english: when something such as money or skills are not used in a way that is effective, useful, or sensible
to use more money, time, energy etc than is useful or sensible
waste materials, substances etc are unwanted because the good part of them has been removed

name: sewage
trans: n. 污水，污物

sentences.english: Chlorine is used in sewage treatment.
sentences.chinese: 氯被用于污水处理。

sentences.english: The factory secretly dumped millions of gallons of raw sewage (= sewage that had not been treated ) into the Ohio river.
sentences.chinese: 这家工厂偷偷地把几百万加仑未经处理的污水排放进了俄亥俄河。

detailed_translations.english: the mixture of waste from the human body and used water, that is carried away from houses by pipes under the ground

name: fume
trans: v. 发怒，生气；冒气（或烟、汽）；熏（尤指木材） n. 刺鼻（或有害）的气，烟

sentences.english: ...car exhaust fumes.
sentences.chinese: …汽车尾气。

detailed_translations.english: Fumes are the unpleasant and often unhealthy smoke and gases that are produced by fires or by things such as chemicals, fuel, or cooking
to give off smoke or gases

name: habitat
trans: n. （动植物的）生活环境，栖息地

sentences.english: watching monkeys in their natural habitat
sentences.chinese: 观察自然生活环境中的猴子

sentences.english: The grassland is an important habitat for many wild flowers.
sentences.chinese: 这片草原是很多野花的重要生长地。

detailed_translations.english: the natural home of a plant or animal

name: balance
trans: n. 平衡，均衡，均势；平衡能力；账户余额，结存；结欠，余款；天平，秤；（乐器）平衡器 v. 保持平衡；权衡，斟酌；使收支平衡；均衡，抵消

sentences.english: She balanced the cup on her knee.
sentences.chinese: 她把杯子在膝盖上放稳。

detailed_translations.english: to put your body or sth else into a position where it is steady and does not fall
an instrument for weighing things, with two dishes that hang from a bar

name: ecosystem
trans: n. 生态系统

sentences.english: ...the forest ecosystem.
sentences.chinese: …森林生态系统。

detailed_translations.english: all the animals and plants in a particular area, and the way in which they are related to each other and to their environment

name: fauna
trans: n. 动物群；[动]动物区系 n. （Fauna）人名；（瑞典）福纳

sentences.english: ...the flora and fauna of the African jungle.
sentences.chinese: …非洲丛林的植物群和动物群。

detailed_translations.english: all the animals living in a particular area or period in history

name: decibel
trans: n. 分贝

sentences.english: noise levels exceeding 85 decibels
sentences.chinese: 超过85分贝的噪声强度

detailed_translations.english: a unit for measuring the loudness of sound

name: ozonosphere
trans: n. [地物]臭氧层（等于 ozone layer）

name: surge
trans: n. 激增，猛增；（风、水等的）奔涌，汹涌；（情感的）涌起，翻涌；（人群的）蜂拥；电流急冲，电涌；增兵，增援 v. 急剧上升，激增；（人群，自然力）汹涌，奔腾；（感情）涌起，涌现；（电压，电流）猛增，浪涌；（绳子，缆索，绞盘）突然松开，突然滑脱

sentences.english: a device that protects your computer against electrical surges
sentences.chinese: 一台计算机电涌保护设备

detailed_translations.chinese: 汹涌；大浪，波涛；汹涌澎湃；巨涌
detailed_translations.english: a sudden quick movement of a liquid, electricity, chemical etc through something
if a feeling surges or surges up, you begin to feel it very strongly

name: hackneyed
trans: adj. 陈腐的；平庸的 v. 出租（马匹、马车等）；役使（hackney 的过去式）

sentences.english: Power corrupts and absolute power corrupts absolutely. That's the old hackneyed phrase, but it's true.
sentences.chinese: 权力导致腐败，绝对权力导致绝对腐败。这虽是老生常谈，但无半点虚言。

detailed_translations.english: a hackneyed phrase is boring and does not have much meaning because it has been used so often

detailed_translations.chinese: 出租（马匹、马车等）；役使（hackney的过去式）

name: caustic
trans: adj. [化学] 腐蚀性的；[化学] 苛性的；刻薄的；焦散的 n. [助剂] 腐蚀剂；苛性钠；焦散曲线

sentences.english: caustic soda (= a chemical used for cleaning things )
sentences.chinese: 苛性钠，烧碱

detailed_translations.chinese: [化学] 腐蚀性的；[化学] 苛性的；刻薄的；焦散的
detailed_translations.english: a caustic substance can burn through things by chemical action

detailed_translations.chinese: [助剂] 腐蚀剂；苛性钠；焦散曲线

name: erosion
trans: n. 侵蚀，腐蚀；削弱，降低；糜烂，溃疡

sentences.english: the problem of soil erosion
sentences.chinese: 水土流失的问题

sentences.english: the erosion of the coastline
sentences.chinese: 海岸线受到的侵蚀

detailed_translations.english: the process by which rock or soil is gradually destroyed by wind, rain, or the sea

name: erode
trans: v. 侵蚀，腐蚀；削弱，降低

sentences.english: The cliffs are being constantly eroded by heavy seas.
sentences.chinese: 悬崖正不断受到汹涌海浪的侵蚀。

sentences.english: The rocks have gradually eroded away.
sentences.chinese: 岩石逐渐风化。

detailed_translations.english: if the weather erodes rock or soil, or if rock or soil erodes, its surface is gradually destroyed

name: stale
trans: adj. （食物）不新鲜的，变味的；气味不清新的，难闻的；没有新意的，老掉牙的；（因长期从事同一工作而）疲沓的，厌倦的；（支票，合法要求）（因过期而）失效的 v. （使）不新鲜，（使）走味，（使）陈旧；（动物，尤指马）撒尿 n. 尿

sentences.english: stale jokes
sentences.chinese: 老掉牙的笑话

trans: n. （植物学）莲座叶，莲座丛；玫瑰形饰物；（建筑学）圆花饰 n. （Rosette）人名；（法）罗塞特

sentences.english: Marjorie stood on the porch with a big yellow rosette tied around the post.
sentences.chinese: 马乔里站在柱子上系着一个巨大的黄色玫瑰花形饰物的门廊里。

detailed_translations.chinese: 莲座丛；玫瑰形饰物；[建] 圆花饰
detailed_translations.english: a circular  badge  made of coloured  ribbon  that is given to the winner of a competition, or that people in Britain wear to show support for a particular football team or political party

name: germinate
trans: vt. 使发芽；使生长 vi. 发芽；生长

sentences.english: Some seed varieties germinate fast, so check every day or so.
sentences.chinese: 有一些品种的种子发芽快，所以差不多每天都要察看一下。

detailed_translations.english: if a seed germinates, or if it is germinated, it begins to grow

name: sprout
trans: v. （植物）发芽，抽条；（毛发等）生长，长出；涌现，突然出现；从表面凸出 n. 苗，新芽，嫩枝；（用作蔬菜的）豆芽，紫花苜蓿芽（sprouts）；球芽甘蓝

sentences.english: Move the pots outside when the seeds begin to sprout.
sentences.chinese: 种子开始发芽时把盆搬到外面去。

sentences.english: Trees were starting to sprout new leaves.
sentences.chinese: 树上开始抽出新叶。

detailed_translations.english: if vegetables, seeds, or plants sprout, they start to grow, producing  shoots  ,  buds  , or leaves
a small green vegetable like a very small  cabbage

name: timber
trans: n. 木材，原木；（用于生产木材的）林木，树林；（造屋或造船用的）大木料，栋木；（砍伐树木时说）倒啦，小心大树倒下；<美>（尤指人适于某角色的）素质，性格，才干 v. 用木料支撑或建造

sentences.english: a bench made of timber
sentences.chinese: 木制长椅

detailed_translations.english: wood used for building or making things

name: cluster
trans: n. 组，簇；星团；一连串同类事件；（聚集在同一地方的）一群人；（计算机磁盘上的）丛集，群集；辅音群，辅音连缀；基 v. 群聚，聚集；（数据点）具近似数值

sentences.english: Do this for all nodes in the cluster.
sentences.chinese: 对集群中的所有节点都这样做。

sentences.english: This can be done on any server of the cluster.
sentences.chinese: 可以在集群的任何服务器中这样做。

sentences.english: However, there are some problems in the cluster environment.
sentences.chinese: 然而，在集群环境中却存在一些问题。

detailed_translations.english: a group of things of the same kind that are very close together
if a group of people or things cluster somewhere, or are clustered somewhere, they form a small group in that place

name: bunch
trans: n. 束，串，扎；一伙，一群；大量；<英>发辫（bunches）；突起 v. 捆，扎，使集中；收紧，起褶

sentences.english: She bunched the cloth up and threw it away.
sentences.chinese: 她把布揉成一团扔了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 集中， 挤在一起； 形成一束
detailed_translations.english: to pull material together tightly in folds
a group of things that are fastened, held, or growing together
to hold or tie things together in a bunch

name: bark
trans: v. 大声嚷，吼叫；（狗）吠，叫；擦破（胫部的）皮；剥去（树，木头的）皮 n. 狗叫声，吠声；吼叫声；树皮；小帆船，三桅帆船

sentences.english: In Finland purists insist that only birch bark should be added.
sentences.chinese: 在芬兰，纯化论者坚持说只能加白桦树皮。

sentences.english: Cork bark is closely intertwined with the lives of the people in these regions.
sentences.chinese: 软木橡树的树皮与这些地方的百姓生活密切地交织在一起。

sentences.english: In his workshop, a Kakunodate craftsman prepares the cherry bark before applying this as a veneer to a range of objects.
sentences.chinese: 在将这种工艺作为一系列物体的单板运用之前，角馆的工匠在自己的作坊准备樱花树皮。

detailed_translations.english: the outer covering of a tree

name: twig
trans: n. 小枝，嫩枝；（剖）血管小支，神经小支 v. <英，非正式>顿悟，突然明白；<古>察觉，观察

sentences.english: There is the bird, sitting on a twig halfway up the tree.
sentences.chinese: 鸟儿在那里，栖息在树中段的一根细枝上。

detailed_translations.english: to understand (something)
a small very thin stem of wood that grows from a branch on a tree

trans: n. 大树枝 n. （Bough）人名；（英）博夫

sentences.chinese: 我把我的鱼竿靠在松树的一个大树枝上。

detailed_translations.english: a main branch on a tree

trans: n. 树枝，分枝；分支机构，分店；（政府或机构的）部门；分科，分支；（家族的）支系；支流，岔路 v. 分岔，岔开；出枝，发出新枝

sentences.english: After the storm, the ground was littered with twigs and branches.
sentences.chinese: 暴风雨过后，满地都是大大小小的树枝。

sentences.english: The topmost branches were full of birds.
sentences.chinese: 树梢上停满了鸟儿。

sentences.english: She now works in our Denver branch.
sentences.chinese: 现在她在我们的丹佛分部工作。

sentences.english: a branch of mathematics/physics/biology etc
sentences.chinese: 数学/物理/生物学等的分支

detailed_translations.english: a part of a tree that grows out from the trunk and that has leaves, fruit, or smaller branches growing from it

name: stem
trans: n. （植物、灌木的）茎，干；（高脚酒杯的）柄脚；（语法中的）词干；烟斗柄；主干；船头，艏柱；（机械装置的）阀杆，导杆，棒；<古，文>血统；<美>（手表的）发条转柄；（文字的）干线，（音符的）符干；<美，非正式>鸦片烟枪 v. 阻止，遏制；止住（液体的流动）；起源于；去梗，去柄；（船）逆流而行；（滑雪）向外转动（滑雪屐）以便转弯（或减速）；给……装柄 abbr. （STEM）理工科的统称（science, technology, engineering, and mathematics）

sentences.english: ‘Writ ’ is the stem of the forms ‘writes ’, ‘writing ’ and ‘written ’.
sentences.chinese: writ是writes、writing和written三个词的词干。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a word that stays the same when different endings are added to it, for example ‘driv-’ in ‘driving’

name: stalk
trans: n. （植物的）茎，秆；（动物的）肉柄，肉茎；柄；（车辆）（转向柱上控制指示仪、灯光等的）手柄；悄悄追踪；高视阔步 v. 偷偷接近，潜近；跟踪，盯梢；怒冲冲地走，趾高气扬地走；令人厌恶地穿过，威胁地通过；<文>（不好的气氛）笼罩，蔓延

sentences.english: celery stalks
sentences.chinese: 芹菜茎

detailed_translations.english: to walk in a proud or angry way, with long steps
a long narrow part of a plant that supports leaves, fruits, or flowers
to follow a person or animal quietly in order to catch and attack or kill them

name: trunk
trans: n. 树干；（人或动物的）躯干；象鼻；<美>（汽车后部的）行李箱，后备箱；旅行箱，衣箱；男式游泳裤（trunks）；大血管，神经干；电缆管道，通风管；拳击手短裤（trunks） adj. 干线的

sentences.english: He left his bicycle leaning against a tree trunk .
sentences.chinese: 他把他的自行车斜靠在树干上。

detailed_translations.chinese: 树干；躯干；象鼻；汽车车尾的行李箱
detailed_translations.english: the thick central woody stem of a tree

name: leafstalk
trans: n. 叶柄

name: leaflet
trans: n. 传单，小册子；小叶，初生叶（统称） v. 散发传单（或小册子）

sentences.english: a leaflet on skin cancer
sentences.chinese: 有关皮肤癌的宣传页

sentences.english: Students were handing out election leaflets at the station.
sentences.chinese: 学生在车站分发选举传单。

detailed_translations.english: a small book or piece of paper advertising something or giving information on a particular subject

name: bud
trans: n. 芽，花蕾；<美，非正式>伙计，老兄；芽体 v. 发芽，长出花蕾；为……进行芽接

sentences.english: rose buds
sentences.chinese: 玫瑰花苞

detailed_translations.english: a young tightly rolled-up flower or leaf before it opens

name: flower
trans: n. 花，开花植物；精华，最好的部分 v. 开花；繁荣，兴旺

sentences.chinese: 一簇开着娇嫩的粉红色花朵的美丽蔷薇

sentences.english: fields full of beautiful wild flowers
sentences.chinese: 开满美丽野花的田野

sentences.english: It was May, and the apple trees were all in flower.
sentences.chinese: 那是个5月，苹果树开满了花。

detailed_translations.english: a coloured or white part that a plant or tree produces before fruit or seeds

name: foliage
trans: n. （植物的）枝叶，叶子

sentences.chinese: 墨绿色的叶子

detailed_translations.english: the leaves of a plant

name: petal
trans: n. 花瓣

sentences.english: rose petals
sentences.chinese: 玫瑰花瓣

sentences.english: The flower has seven petals.
sentences.chinese: 这种花有七片花瓣。

name: cell

sentences.english: cancer cells
sentences.chinese: 癌细胞

sentences.english: Embryos grow by cell division (= the splitting of cells ) .
sentences.chinese: 胚胎通过细胞分裂而成长。

sentences.english: ...a small package wrapped in tissue paper.
sentences.chinese: …一个小包裹，用薄棉纸包着。

sentences.english: As we age we lose muscle tissue.
sentences.chinese: 随着年纪的增大，我们会失去一些肌肉组织。

detailed_translations.english: light thin paper used for wrapping, packing etc

trans: n. 皮；外壳；无价值之物 vt. 削皮；以粗哑的嗓音说 vi. 嗓音变得嘶哑

sentences.english: There you are, in the coffin, or in an urn, your body reduced to a husk of meant-to-be's.
sentences.chinese: 你现在是这副样子，躺在棺材里，或者骨灰盒里。 你的身体沦为一张毫无意思的臭皮囊。

sentences.english: All the days of his separation shall he eat nothing that is made of the vine tree, from the kernels even to the husk.
sentences.chinese: 在一切离俗的日子，凡葡萄树上结的，自核至皮所作的物，都不可吃。

sentences.english: How can we remove the husk of the grains?
sentences.chinese: 我们怎样去掉谷物的外皮？

detailed_translations.english: to remove the husks from grains, seeds etc
the dry outer part of corn, some grains, seeds, nuts etc

name: pollen
trans: n. 花粉

sentences.english: So how do you train them to respond to TNT the way they respond to pollen?
sentences.chinese: 那么你如何才能训练它们，使得它们对TNT炸药的反应与对花粉的反应一样呢？

sentences.english: The problem occurs because plants need to transfer pollen by wind and insect to fertilization and reproduce.
sentences.chinese: 发生这样的问题是因为植物需要通过风和昆虫传递花粉进行受精繁殖。

sentences.english: "Almost all were incorrectly labeled based on their pollen and nectar contents, " he said.
sentences.chinese: 他说，“根据花粉和花蜜含量，几乎所有的产品标签都有问题。”

detailed_translations.english: a fine powder produced by flowers, which is carried by the wind or by insects to other flowers of the same type, making them produce seeds

name: root
trans: n. （植物的）根，根茎；根用作物；（头发、牙齿、指甲等的）根部；底部，基部；根源，起因；起源，背景；（某人的）祖籍（roots）；与……的特殊关联（roots in）；（圣经）根苗，苗裔；（语言学）词根；（乐）根音（=root note）；（数学）方根；（神经的）根；<澳新，俚>性交；<澳新，俚>（有明确性能的）性交伙伴 v. （使）生根；扎根于，在……中根深蒂固；根源在于，由……产生（be rooted in）；使（某人）无法移动；（动物）用鼻拱土觅食；翻找，搜寻；<澳新，俚>与……性交；使精疲力竭，挫败

sentences.english: tree roots
sentences.chinese: 树根

sentences.english: These plants produce a number of thin roots.
sentences.chinese: 这些植物会长出一些细根。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a plant or tree that grows under the ground and gets water from the soil
to grow roots

name: log
trans: n. 原木，圆材；正式记录，航海日志；对数；（定期或系统的）观察记录；船舶测速仪 v. 正式记录；行驶，行进（若干距离或时间）；伐木，砍伐；<美>成功获得，取得（成就）

sentences.english: a roaring log fire
sentences.chinese: 原木燃烧的熊熊大火

detailed_translations.english: a thick piece of wood from a tree
to make an official record of events, facts etc

name: flora
trans: n. （某地区、栖息地或地质时期的）植物群，植物区系；植物志

sentences.english: Tourism is damaging the flora and fauna (= plants and animals ) of the island.
sentences.chinese: 旅游业正在破坏该岛的动植物资源。

detailed_translations.english: all the plants that grow in a particular place or country

name: botany
trans: n. 植物学；（特定地区的）植物（生态）

sentences.english: He studied botany at university.
sentences.chinese: 他在大学学习植物学。

sentences.english: To what degree are you interested in botany?
sentences.chinese: 你对植物学的兴趣达到什么程度?

sentences.english: The first of these in the field of botany were the herbals.
sentences.chinese: 在植物学领域，这些最早的著作是本草书。

detailed_translations.english: the scientific study of plants

name: botanical
trans: adj. 植物（学）的 n. 植物制剂

sentences.english: The area is of great botanical interest.
sentences.chinese: 该地区很有植物学研究价值。

detailed_translations.english: relating to plants or the scientific study of plants

name: crossbreed
trans: v. （使）杂交繁育；杂交繁育 n. （动植物的）杂交品种

detailed_translations.english: an animal or plant that is a mixture of breeds

name: necrosis
trans: n. 坏死；坏疽；骨疽

sentences.english: ...liver necrosis.
sentences.chinese: ...肝坏死。

detailed_translations.english: Necrosis is the death of part of someone's body, for example because it is not getting enough blood

name: peel
trans: v. 除去，剥去（水果、蔬菜等的）皮；去掉，剥掉，揭掉；剥落，脱落，脱皮；（水果，蔬菜）有可被除掉的皮；（槌球）把（另一球员的球）传过拱门 n. （水果、蔬菜的）皮，外皮；去角质；（16世纪时建在英格兰和苏格兰交界各郡的）堡塔，堡寨

sentences.english: Peel and dice the potatoes.
sentences.chinese: 把马铃薯去皮并切成丁。

detailed_translations.english: to remove the skin from fruit or vegetables
to remove the skin from fruit or vegetables
the skin of some fruits and vegetables, especially the thick skin of fruits such as oranges, which you do not eat

name: photosynthesis
trans: n. 光合作用

sentences.english: It has at least one gene necessary for photosynthesis—so far it’s the only animal known with this ability.
sentences.chinese: 它有至少一个基因是光合作用所必需的——到目前为止这是唯一被发现具有此项能力的动物。

sentences.english: The belt of vegetation that crosses Africa below the Sahara is very dark because most of the sunlight is absorbed by plants for photosynthesis.
sentences.chinese: 在撒哈拉沙漠下方，横贯非洲中部的植被带颜色非常深，因为植物由于光合作用吸收了大多数太阳光。

sentences.english: As the ocean warms, it becomes more stratified, with the warmer water remaining at the top where the organisms need to be in order to do photosynthesis.
sentences.chinese: 但是随着海水变暖，它的层次会更加分明，温度更高的海水会停留在表面，而这里正是生物体进行光合作用必需的地方。

detailed_translations.english: the production by a green plant of special substances like sugar that it uses as food, caused by the action of sunlight on  chlorophyll (= the green substance in leaves )

name: pollinate
trans: vt. 对……授粉

sentences.english: flowers pollinated by bees
sentences.chinese: 由蜜蜂授粉的花

detailed_translations.english: to give a flower or plant pollen so that it can produce seeds

name: pollination
trans: n. [农学] 授粉（作用）

sentences.english: The new research provides early evidence that climate change may be playing a role in driving down pollination.
sentences.chinese: 这项新的研究提供了初步证据，气候变化可能是促使授粉减少的一个因素。

sentences.english: They say there is risk of 'gene pollution' — where the inserted gene of GM plants affects non-target plants of similar kinds via pollination.
sentences.chinese: 他们说存在“基因污染”的危险——插入基因片段的转基因作物通过授粉途径对类似的非目标作物产生影响。

sentences.english: This is sobering because it suggests that pollination is vulnerable even in a relatively pristine environment that is free of pesticides and human disturbance but still subject to climate change.
sentences.chinese: 这是发人深省的，它表明授粉过程极易被打乱，甚至在一个相对平静安定的环境，没有农药和人为干扰，但仍然受到气候变化的影响。

name: seeds
trans: n. 种子；种子选手（seed 的复数）；种子状物；子孙后代 v. 播种；取出……的核；催化（seed 的第三人称单数） n. （Seeds）人名；（英）西兹

name: shell
trans: n. （蛋、坚果、某些种子和某些动物的）壳；（甲虫的）鞘翅；（尤指建筑物等遭破坏后剩下的）框架，骨架；壳状物；（人的）表面性格，表面感情；空躯壳；（物理）壳层；炮弹；<美>子弹，弹药筒；轻型赛艇；内棺，粗制棺材；（剑的）护手；（计算机）SHELL PROGRAM 的简称 v. 剥……壳；炮轰；（从对方投手）大量得分

sentences.english: We ran for cover as shells dropped all around us.
sentences.chinese: 周围炮弹四处飞落，我们奔跑着寻找地方躲避。

sentences.english: an exploding mortar shell
sentences.chinese: 一枚爆炸的迫击炮弹

detailed_translations.english: a metal container, like a large bullet, which is full of an explosive substance and is fired from a large gun

detailed_translations.chinese: 剥落；设定命令行解释器的位置
detailed_translations.english: to remove something such as beans or nuts from a shell or  pod

name: shoot

sentences.chinese: 谷仓里堆满了粮食。

sentences.english: The dilapidated barn detracts charm from the landscape.
sentences.chinese: 圮废失修的谷仓有损景色的美。

sentences.english: The grain is liable to mildew when the humidity in the barn is too high.
sentences.chinese: 仓库里潮气太大， 粮食就容易发霉。

detailed_translations.english: a large farm building for storing crops, or for keeping animals in

name: cowshed
trans: n. 牛棚，牛舍

name: granary
trans: n. 谷仓，粮仓；盛产粮食的地区 n. （Granary）人名；（法）格拉纳里

sentences.english: The Mid-West is the granary of the U.S.
sentences.chinese: 中西部是美国的粮仓。

sentences.english: Every journey has its low point, and ours was the granary of France, known as the Beauce.
sentences.chinese: 每次旅行都有低潮，我们的低潮是在贝奥斯，这里是有名的法兰西谷仓。

sentences.english: "Now, it fills one granary and half of another"—roughly a 50 percent increase in production.
sentences.chinese: 金多说，“现在的产量可以装满一个半粮仓了” ，粗略的计算，有50%的增产了。

detailed_translations.english: a place where grain, especially wheat, is stored

name: greenhouse
trans: n. 温室，暖房 adj. 温室效应的

sentences.english: What we are seeking, after all, is not simply an agreement to limit greenhouse gas emissions.
sentences.chinese: 我们正在寻求的目标毕竟不只是一项限制温室气体排放的协议。

sentences.english: I think each and every one of us is responsible for the greenhouse gases we emit in our daily actions and choices.
sentences.chinese: 我认为每一个人都是我们每天的行动和选择中排放的温室气体的责任。

sentences.english: But presently it was set in a greenhouse, where the sunlight fell warm upon it, and water was sprinkled over it, and day by day as it waited, a change began to come to it.
sentences.chinese: 但是过了不久，黏土又给人放进了一间温室，这里阳光和煦地照射着它，并且经常给它喷水，这样就在它一天天静静等候的时候，某种变化终于开始到来。

detailed_translations.english: a glass building used for growing plants that need warmth, light, and protection

name: seedbed
trans: n. 苗床，苗圃；（事物发展的）有利环境，温床，发源地

name: sheepfold
trans: n. 羊圈；羊栏

trans: n. 果园；果树林

sentences.chinese: 樱桃园

detailed_translations.english: a place where fruit trees are grown

trans: n. 牧场，牧草地；生活状况，个人发展的机遇 v. 放牧；（牛、羊等）在草地上吃草

sentences.english: large areas of rough upland pasture
sentences.chinese: 大片起伏的山地牧场

sentences.english: the lush pastures of the southern counties
sentences.chinese: 南部各郡茂盛的牧场

to put animals outside in a field to feed on the grass

trans: n. 猪舍；猪舍似的地方

trans: n. 猪舍；木垛；脏乱的地方

sentences.chinese: 那房子和平时一样，脏得像个猪窝。

detailed_translations.english: a very dirty or untidy place

name: plantation
trans: n. （尤指热带的）种植地，农园；人工林场，苗木场；殖民地，新开垦地；普兰泰申市（美国佛罗里达州城市名）

sentences.english: a rubber plantation
sentences.chinese: 橡胶园

detailed_translations.chinese: 适用于种植园或热带、亚热带国家的

name: ranch
trans: n. （尤指饲养牛、马、羊等的）大农场，大牧场；<美>牧场式住宅（=ranch house）；<美>酸奶油沙拉酱（=ranch dressing） v. 经营牧场（或农场）；在农场饲养（牲畜）；把（土地）用作牧场（或农场）

sentences.english: He lives on a cattle ranch in Texas.
sentences.chinese: 他住在德克萨斯州的一个养牛的大牧场里。

detailed_translations.english: a very large farm in the western US and Canada where sheep, cattle, or horses are bred

name: trough
trans: n. （喂家畜的）饲料槽，饮水槽； （商业活动等的）淡季，低谷； （波浪间的）波谷，（小山间的）低谷；低压槽，槽形低压；（用于培植植物、调配化学制品的）槽形容器；（运水的）沟槽；地表槽谷；钱槽，钱眼；（数）凹点 v. 狼吞虎咽

sentences.english: a horse trough
sentences.chinese: 马槽

detailed_translations.chinese: 水槽，水槽；低谷期；饲料槽；低气压
detailed_translations.english: a long narrow open container that holds water or food for animals

name: plow
trans: n. 犁；犁过的地；雪犁；犁式；北斗七星（the Plow） v. 耕，犁；（用犁）挖出；（用或仿佛用犁）划出（沟或线）；艰难地进行；奋力前进；（尤指车辆）猛撞；<美>（用铲雪机）铲雪；（轮船，木船）穿过（水域），破浪前进

sentences.english: He teamed one horse and one cow to a plow.
sentences.chinese: 他把一匹马和一头牛套在犁上。

sentences.english: The huge animals use their heads like a plow to push snow aside in search of food.
sentences.chinese: 这些庞大的动物在找食物时用他们的头像犁一样将雪推到一边。

sentences.english: In 1930, a farmer with a tractor-pulled plow, combine, and truck could do the job in 20 hours.
sentences.chinese: 1930年，农民使用拖拉机牵引的犁、联合收割机和卡车只需20小时便可完成这些工作。

trans: adj. 含蓄的，未言明的；内含的，固有的；无疑问的，无保留的；（函数）隐式的，隐的

sentences.chinese: …叫摩洛哥人不要继续或重复一周前开始的军事行动的含蓄警告。

detailed_translations.chinese: 不言明的， 含蓄的； 内含的， 固有的； 无疑问的
detailed_translations.english: suggested or understood without being stated directly

trans: adj. 简明的，简洁的

detailed_translations.english: short, with no unnecessary words

sentences.english: She was fluent in English, French, and German.
sentences.chinese: 她的英语、法语和德语都很流利。

detailed_translations.english: able to speak a language very well

detailed_translations.english: if a statement is cogent, it seems reasonable and correct

trans: adj. 有说服力的，能使人信服的

sentences.english: Providing examples of what others are saying about your suitability and skills is extremely persuasive and the more you have, the more your influence rises.
sentences.chinese: 举例说明别人对你的适合性和技能的评价十分有说服力，这样的例子越多，你的影响力增长的就越大。

trans: n. 性格，品质；特色，特征；人物，角色；勇气，毅力；某种人，古怪有趣的人；（书写或印刷）符号，文字，字体；名誉，名声 v. <古>刻，写；描述；使具有特征

sentences.chinese: 他的性格乐观文静。

sentences.english: Everyone recognizes Disney’s cartoon characters.
sentences.chinese: 迪士尼的卡通人物尽人皆知。

sentences.english: The whole character of the school has changed.
sentences.chinese: 这所学校的特色已经完全变了。

detailed_translations.english: the particular combination of qualities that makes someone a particular type of person

sentences.chinese: 为了方便读者，还收录了术语汇编。

detailed_translations.english: a list of special words and explanations of their meanings, often at the end of a book

trans: n. 方言，土话

sentences.chinese: 当地方言

detailed_translations.chinese: 方言，土话；同源语；行话；个人用语特征
detailed_translations.english: a form of a language which is spoken only in one area, with words or grammar that are slightly different from other forms of the same language

sentences.chinese: 关于这一点，这个语言学博士足足讲了三个小时，我再次退出了。

trans: n. 发音学，语音学

sentences.english: Forensics includes many fields of science, including anthropology, biology, chemistry, engineering, genetics, medicine, pathology, phonetics, psychiatry, and toxicology.
sentences.chinese: 法医物证学涉及到多个科学领域，包括人类学、工程学、医药学、病理学、语音学、精神病学和毒理学。

sentences.english: Taking such refresher courses in Linguistics as phonetics, phonology, morphology, and etymology in Dept. of Japanese at Shanghai University of Foreign Languages (9/1992-7/1993).
sentences.chinese: 在上海外国语大学日语系进修语音学，音位学，形态学和词源学等语言学课程（1992年9月至1993年7月）。

sentences.english: Useful Courses for English-teaching include: Psychology, teaching methodology,phonetics, rhetoric, grammar, composition.
sentences.chinese: 对英语教学有用的课程包括：心理学、教学方法论、语音学、修辞学、语法、写作。

name: tense
trans: adj. 紧张的，焦虑的；（气氛或局势）令人紧张的，引发恐慌的；（身体或肌肉）僵直的，绷紧的；（金属丝等）拉紧的，绷紧的；（语音，尤指元音）紧的 v. （使）（身体或肌肉）绷紧，（使）变得僵直；变得神经紧张 n. （动词的）时态

sentences.english: Is anything wrong? You look a little tense.
sentences.chinese: 有什么不对劲吗？你看起来有点紧张。

detailed_translations.english: a tense situation is one in which you feel very anxious and worried because of something bad that might happen
to make your muscles tight and stiff, or to become tight and stiff

any of the forms of a verb that show the time, continuance, or completion of an action or state that is expressed by the verb. ‘I am’ is in the present tense, ‘I was’ is past tense, and ‘I will be’ is future tense.

name: version
trans: n. （同一种物件稍有不同的）样式，型号；（从不同角度的）说法，描述；（电影、剧本、乐曲等的）版本，改编形式；《圣经》译本；胎位倒转术 v. 创制……的新版本，更新……的版本

sentences.english: Is the coffee break the adult version of recess?

detailed_translations.chinese: 风俗画的；以日常情景为主题的

sentences.english: You just search for an artist, song, album , or just a random search tag.
sentences.chinese: 你只需要搜索艺术家、歌曲、相册、或者仅仅是一个随机搜索标签。

detailed_translations.english: a small piece of paper, plastic etc attached to something to show what it is, who owns it, what it costs etc
to attach a tag to something

sentences.english: an advertising slogan
sentences.chinese: 一句广告口号

sentences.english: demonstrators shouting political slogans
sentences.chinese: 高喊政治口号的示威者

sentences.english: the Democrats’ campaign slogan
sentences.chinese: 民主党的竞选口号

detailed_translations.english: a short phrase that is easy to remember and is used in advertisements, or by politicians, organizations etc

name: lyric
trans: n. 歌词；抒情诗 adj. 抒情的，写抒情诗的；（歌声）柔美的；适于演奏的；（感情、风格等）奔放的，不拘束的

sentences.english: Wordsworth was one of the greatest lyric poets of his time.
sentences.chinese: 华兹华斯是他那个时代最伟大的抒情诗人之一。

detailed_translations.english: expressing strong personal emotions such as love, in a way that is similar to music in its sounds and  rhythm
the words of a song

name: verse
trans: n. 诗，韵文；诗节，（歌曲的）节；（《圣经》或其他经文的）节，句；（赞美诗的）独唱部，小组唱部 v. <古>作诗

sentences.english: Let’s sing the last verse again.
sentences.chinese: 我们把最后一节再唱一遍吧。

sentences.english: Learn the first two verses of the poem by heart.
sentences.chinese: 把这首诗的头两节背下来。

sentences.english: Genesis chapter 3, verse 13
sentences.chinese: 《创世记》第3章第13节

detailed_translations.english: a set of lines that forms one part of a song, poem, or a book such as the Bible or the Koran

name: fiction
trans: n. 小说；虚构的事，谎言；杜撰，编造

sentences.english: romantic fiction
sentences.chinese: 爱情小说

sentences.english: historical fiction
sentences.chinese: 历史小说

sentences.english: For years he managed to keep up the fiction that he was not married.
sentences.chinese: 多年来他设法一直给人一种未婚的假象。

detailed_translations.english: books and stories about imaginary people and events

name: fable
trans: n. 寓言；谎言，无稽之谈；神话，传说 v. 虚构，撒谎；讲寓言，编寓言；煞有介事地讲述

sentences.english: the fable of the fox and the crow
sentences.chinese: 狐狸和乌鸦的寓言故事

detailed_translations.english: a traditional short story that teaches a moral lesson, especially a story about animals

name: term
trans: n. （某人做某事或某事发生的）时期，期限，任期；学期，开庭期；到期，期满；术语，专有名词；措辞，说话的方式（terms）；方面，角度（terms）；（人们之间的）关系（terms）；条件，条款（terms）；付款条件，购买（出售）条件（terms）；（结束战争，解决争端的）条件（terms）；（数学运算中的）项；（逻）（三段论中的）项；（尤指苏格兰的）法定结账日（term day）；<法律> 有限期租用的地产；（建筑）界标 v. 把……称为，把……叫做

sentences.english: Teachers often feel overworked in term time (= during the term ) .
sentences.chinese: 教师在学期内经常觉得工作担子过重。

detailed_translations.chinese: 术语；学期；期限；条款；(代数式等的)项

to use a particular word or expression to name or describe something

name: maxim
trans: n. 格言；准则；座右铭 n. （Maxim）人名；（英、罗、俄、哈萨）马克西姆

sentences.english: I believe in the maxim "if it ain't broke, don't fix it."
sentences.chinese: 我相信这句格言：“如果它没坏，不要去修理它。”

detailed_translations.english: a well-known phrase or saying, especially one that gives a rule for sensible behaviour

name: satire
trans: n. 讽刺，讥讽；讽刺作品；讽刺文学；（拉丁文学的）讽刺杂咏（尤指讽刺时弊的诗）

sentences.english: the characteristic use of satire in Jonson’s work
sentences.chinese: 琼森作品中讽刺手法的独到运用

detailed_translations.chinese: 讽刺；讽刺文学，讽刺作品
detailed_translations.english: a way of criticizing something such as a group of people or a system, in which you deliberately make them seem funny so that people will see their faults

name: farce
trans: n. 荒唐的事情，闹剧；滑稽戏（剧本），闹剧（剧本）

sentences.english: She admitted that the interview had been a complete farce from start to finish.
sentences.chinese: 她承认，采访从头到尾完全是一场闹剧。

name: synopsis

sentences.english: For each title there is a brief synopsis of the book.

sentences.english: The document was compiled by the Department of Health.
sentences.chinese: 这份文件是由卫生部汇编的。
